sourcesContent:
Our Doctors
Here you can check all our doctors and their specialities
# Doctor Email Speciality Details
{{i+1}} {{doctor.name + ' ' + doctor.surname}} {{doctor.emailAddress}} {{doctor.speciality}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ServerResponse } from 'src/app/models/server-response.model'; import { Doctor } from 'src/app/models/doctor.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-doctors-page', templateUrl: './doctors-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./doctors-page.component.scss'] }) export class DoctorsPageComponent implements OnInit { doctors1 = [ { name:'Peter Parker', email:'p.parker@gmail.com', speciality:'Spiderman' }, { name:'Steven Strange', email:'steven.strange@marvel.com', speciality:'Surgeon' }, ]; data : any; doctors : any; constructor(private http: HttpClient ){ } ngOnInit() { this.getDoctors(); } showDoctors(){ console.log(this.doctors); } async getDoctors(){ const docs = await this.http.get>('https://localhost:7288/api/Doctor').subscribe(response => { console.log(response); this.doctors = response.entity; console.log(this.doctors); }); // this.doctors = docs; // console.log(this.doctors); } }
